markdownRemark.html: The hardest part of any fitness journey is starting. We wait until we're 'ready,' until we have the perfect plan, perfect equipment, perfect circumstances. But perfection is procrastination in disguise. Greatness begins with imperfect action.

frontmatter.title: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great
frontmatter.excerpt: Begin your fitness journey todayâ€”greatness comes from consistency, not perfection.
frontmatter.author: admin

authorsJson.name: Alex Thompson
authorsJson.bio: Magazine editor and lifestyle writer passionate about fashion, food, and travel. Sharing stories that inspire and inform through thoughtful journalism and creative storytelling.

frontmatter.title: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow
